component.name: Reel
component.summary: A modern media player for GNOME

description.p: Reel is a native Linux media player that brings your Plex and Jellyfin libraries to the GNOME desktop. Built with Rust and GTK4, it delivers a fast, reliable media experience without the overhead of web technologies.

ul.li: Native GTK4/libadwaita interface that integrates seamlessly with GNOME
Support for multiple media backends (Plex, with Jellyfin planned)
Fast and memory-safe, written entirely in Rust
Background synchronization that doesn't block the UI

screenshot.caption: TV show details with episode list

description.p: First major release with comprehensive Plex support:

ul.li: Full Plex integration with OAuth authentication
Cinematic UI with backdrop images and metadata
Watch status tracking and progress indicators
Continue Watching and Recently Added sections
Multi-level image caching with HTTP/2 optimization
Instant startup with SQLite offline cache
